channel.title: CVE Feed for Android -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Android -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1987|2024-09-16T18:48:20.754Z -- android -- android
item.description: In onSetSampleX of SkSwizzler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-118143775.

item.title: CVE-2018-9585|2024-09-16T16:58:56.897Z -- android -- android
item.description: In nfc_ncif_proc_get_routing of nfc_ncif.cc in Android-7.0, Android-7.1.1, Android-7.1.2, Android-8.0, Android-8.1 and Android-9, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Android ID: A-117554809.

item.title: CVE-2018-9586|2024-09-16T16:58:02.607Z -- android -- android
item.description: In run of InstallPackageTask.java in Android-7.0, Android-7.1.1, Android-7.1.2, Android-8.0, Android-8.1 and Android-9, it is possible that package verification is turned off and remains off due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Android ID: A-116754444.

item.title: CVE-2019-1992|2024-09-16T17:37:57.595Z -- android -- android
item.description: In bta_hl_sdp_query_results of bta_hl_main.cc, there is a possible use-after-free due to a race condition. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-116222069.

item.title: CVE-2019-1986|2024-09-16T18:13:17.589Z -- android -- android
item.description: In SkSwizzler::onSetSampleX of SkSwizzler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege in system_server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-117838472.

item.title: CVE-2018-9584|2024-09-16T19:14:37.623Z -- android -- android
item.description: In nfc_ncif_set_config_status of nfc_ncif.cc in Android-7.0, Android-7.1.1, Android-7.1.2, Android-8.0, Android-8.1 and Android-9, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Android ID: A-114047681.

item.title: CVE-2019-2001|2024-09-16T19:09:52.134Z -- android -- android
item.description: The permissions on /proc/iomem were world-readable. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-117422211.

item.title: CVE-2024-7014|2024-07-30T03:55:38.806Z -- android -- telegram%20for%20android
item.description: EvilVideo vulnerability allows sending malicious apps disguised as videos in Telegram for Android application affecting versions 10.14.4 and older.
